tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: Force delete instance
actions.description:
Force deletes an instance before deferred cleanup.
 
 
 Specify the forceDelete action in the request body.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud
 providers can change these permissions through the
 policy.json file.

actions.name: Restore soft-deleted instance
actions.description:
Restores a previously soft-deleted instance. You cannot use
 this method to restore deleted instances.
 
 
 Specify the restore action in the request body.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud
 providers can change these permissions through the
 policy.json file.
